questions: How to use expressions in custom reports and report builder?
answer: Expressions are basically JavaScript Code. You will get the current data in Field object in the expression. You would be able to use most of the inbuilt JavaScript functions as well in your expression. For example you can write Field.assignee.name, Field.summary, parseInt(Field.timespent), etc.. You can use the usual JavaScript Math class and other operators for calculations as well.
